[Biography]{.big .hi}

I am a 5th Year PhD Candidate in Economics at the University of Oregon.

I will be on the Job Market for the 2025-2026 cycle. 

Originally from San Jose, Costa Rica. 
My interests are in the many ways increased international trade, either through imports or FDI, may impact developing economies.
I also have interests in immigration and education topics.
